title: Mortgage Banker
desc:
Post 45
***Sales Pitch** (2x, Charge 120%)*
Target a player during the evening phase. The following night, they will be asked if they would like to gainthe Mortgage passive. If they accept, they will unlock/gain the passive.
***Credit Inquiry** (1x, Locked)*
Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Target a player and learn their exact score and standard deviation.
***Mortgage** (Passive, Locked)*
The first two nights you have this passive, your score will be reduced by 7.5 percentage points. Starting the beginning of the third night, your defense power is permanently increased by 1.0x.
***Loan Interest** (Passive)*
You receive any score points that players who accept your Sales Pitch lose to the Mortgage passive.
***Licensing Requirements** (Passive)*
If responses includes a digit or spelled out number, you are immune to any negative effects potentially triggered by your messages during the next day phase. Additionally, if your response fails this requirement, your score will be reduced by 7.5 percentage points.
